item.title: Blog Post
item.description: I really enjoyed learning how to use Python this semester in class. Having a background in java and R, I really wanted to be exposed to Python as another coding language. The following are examples of how i learned to use Python in class: list1= [1,2,3,4] list1[2] ## 3 list1[0] ## 1 list1[1:] ## [2, 3, 4] Using python we can have a vector and look through it and select certain positions that we want.
